title: Good record keeping
brief_description: This video provides information about the requirements and importance of good record keeping for the New Tax System, implemented July 1, 2000. Presented by Michael Caton. Covers and defines such topics as: Acquisitions ; Australian Business Number ; Business Activity Statement ; GST-free ; Input taxed ; Input tax credit ; PAYG instalments ; PAYG withholding ; Supplies ; Taxable supplies ; Tax period.
